TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtendedRightAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class ExtendedRightAccessRule Inherits ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

summary.span: 表示特定類型的存取規則，用來允許或拒絕 Active Directory 物件的延伸權限。

span.span: Represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory object an extended right.

summary.span: 延伸權限是特殊的作業，不在標準存取權限集合的範圍內。

span.span: Extended rights are special operations that are not covered by the standard set of access rights.

summary.span: 延伸權限的範例像是 [Send-As](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/r_send_as.asp)，此權限可讓使用者為另一位使用者傳送電子郵件。

span.span: An example of an extended right is [Send-As](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/r_send_as.asp), which gives a user the right to send email for another user.

summary.span: 如需可能的延伸權限的清單，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜[延伸權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/extended_rights.asp)＞主題。

span.span: For a list of possible extended rights, see the topic [Extended Rights](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/extended_rights.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

summary.span: 如需延伸權限的詳細資訊，亦請參閱 MSDN Library 中的[控制存取權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_controlaccessrights.asp)主題。

span.span: For more information about extended rights, see the topic [Control Access Rights](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_controlaccessrights.asp), also in the MSDN Library.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ExtendedRightAccessRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type) cil managed
Public Sub New (identity As IdentityReference, type As AccessControlType)
public: ExtendedRightAccessRule(System::Security::Principal::IdentityReference ^ identity, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlType type);

param.name: identity
param.span: 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

summary.span: 使用指定的識別參考和存取控制類型，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference and access control type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立延伸權限的存取規則套用至所有延伸權限。This constructor creates an extended right access rule that applies to all extended rights.

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

param.name: inheritanceType
param.span: 其中一個 列舉值，可指定存取規則的繼承類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

summary.span: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制類型和 Active Directory 安全性繼承，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory security inheritance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式會建立延伸權限的存取規則套用至所有延伸權限。Using this constructor creates an extended right access rule that applies to all extended rights.

MemberSignature.Value: public ExtendedRightAccessRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, Guid extendedRightType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, valuetype System.Guid extendedRightType) cil managed
Public Sub New (identity As IdentityReference, type As AccessControlType, extendedRightType As Guid)
public: ExtendedRightAccessRule(System::Security::Principal::IdentityReference ^ identity, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlType type, Guid extendedRightType);

param.name: identity
param.span: 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

param.name: extendedRightType
param.span: 套用此存取規則之延伸權限的 Rights-Guid。

span.span: The Rights-Guid of the extended right that this access rule applies to.

param.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 中的＜Rights-Guid＞主題。

span.span: For more information, see the topic Rights-Guid in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

param.span: 在 Active Directory 結構描述文件中，此資訊可以在每個延伸權限之參考頁面上的 [Rights-GUID] 列中找到。

span.span: In the Active Directory schema documentation, this information can be found in the **Rights-GUID** row on the reference page for each extended right.

param.span: 如果這個參數是 ，則存取規則會套用至所有延伸權限。

span.span: If this parameter is , the access rule applies to all extended rights.

param.span: 如需延伸權限的清單，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的＜延伸權限＞主題。

span.span: For a list of extended rights, see the topic Extended Rights in the MSDN Library.

summary.span: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制類型和延伸權限識別項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and extended right identifier.

public: ExtendedRightAccessRule(System::Security::Principal::IdentityReference ^ identity, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlType type, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance inheritanceType, Guid inheritedObjectType);

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

param.name: inheritanceType

param.name: inheritedObjectType
param.span: 可繼承此存取規則之子物件類型的結構描述 GUID。

span.span: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
